meanings.definition: Campesinos - noun: rural workers or farmers
meanings.sent1: The campesinos worked hard in the fields all day.
meanings.sent2: The campesinos harvested the crops under the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The campesinos organized a fun festival for the village.
meanings.sent4: The campesinos were the backbone of the agricultural community.
meanings.sent5: The campesinos lived a simple life close to nature.

meanings.definition: Campesinos - adjective: relating to or characteristic of rural workers or farmers
meanings.sent1: The campesinos lifestyle was peaceful and connected to the land.
meanings.sent2: The campesinos community celebrated their traditional culture.
meanings.sent3: The campesinos market was filled with fresh produce and handmade goods.
meanings.sent4: The campesinos spirit of hard work inspired the whole village.
meanings.sent5: The campesinos traditions were passed down through generations.
